do u get my question/prob ?: compile libpcap it needed to install snort
ok, well libpcap is in the repositories
is there a reason you need the latest version, what more does it do?
anyway, try 'sudo apt-get install build-essential && sudo apt-get build-dep snort'  and then try to compile snort.  I doubt you need to compile libpcap
the command I gave you will install it.  But if you want to search for the package, it would be 'apt-cache search -n libpcap'
